trends: There have been no other sightings in Hopkinton
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsHeading west on 11B, I look to my right (south) and observered two orange lights hovering above the tree tops, in the area of power lines. The orange objects were visible for about 60 seconds then the orange object on the left disapeared, the object didnt move it's light got dimer untill it was gone, as I continued driving west the other objected was obstructed from my view by pine trees, upon coming to another clearing, the objects was gone. I turned around and went back to the area I first saw the light, but nothing was there..
Summary: 2 large Orange ball of light hovering over power lines
